```{r packages}
pkgs <- c(
  "Seurat",
  "SpatialExperiment",
  "STexampleData",
  "ggspavis",
  "scater",
  "scarn",
  "pheatmap",
  "Matrix",
  "ggplot2",
  "dplyr",
  "tibble",
  "patchwork"
)

to_install <- pkgs[!vapply(pkgs, requireNamespace, logical(1), quietly = TRUE)]
if (length(to_install) > 0) {
  install.packages(to_install, repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")
}

# Load
lapply(pkgs, library, character.only = TRUE)
```
